attributes.action: Police to take concrete actions and prevent burglaries targeting Asians.
attributes.background: Decent hard-working people have had their lives blighted by these.There  have been instances where burglaries have been done when family members were in the house and that left many of us feeling shocked, worried and very vulnerable and psychologically traumatised and victims been having nightmares.

rejection.details:
This is an action for the police, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could contact your police and crime commissioner (PCC) to make a suggestion or a complaint about policing in your local area:

https://www.gov.uk/police-and-crime-commissioners
